hiveArticle.title: Travel to Cherrapunji, Meghalaya, India
hiveArticle.body:
Cherrapunji is a subdivisional town in the East Khasi Hills district in the Indian state of Meghalaya. 

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTkUzQibabmonM44DguwhRRRQk1YCBRVT8tmDdjc5TcGC/image.png)
